function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of disease from birds to humans","Impact":"Potential for widespread infection and high mortality in human population","Mitigation":"Strengthening surveillance and control measures at the human-animal interface","Technologies":"Genomic surveillance, early detection platforms","People":"General population, especially those in close contact with birds","Owner":"Public health authorities, veterinary professionals"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of young and healthy individuals to H1N1 virus","Impact":"Higher mortality rate in young and healthy population","Mitigation":"Targeted vaccination campaigns for young people, public health education","Technologies":"Vaccines targeting specific age groups, public health communication channels","People":"Young and healthy individuals, healthcare providers","Owner":"Public health authorities, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Continued evolution and mutation of influenza viruses","Impact":"Health threats from new strains, potential for pandemics","Mitigation":"Research and development of broad-spectrum antiviral drugs, improved surveillance and monitoring","Technologies":"Antiviral drug development, advanced genetic sequencing and analysis","People":"General population, public health organizations, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, pharmaceutical companies"}]}
